Reviews.Title: “Nice gym equipment.. albeit rather quiet”
Reviews.Author: Son-of-Poochmas
Reviews.Content: Stayed 06/08; friendly greeting; large room - clean although the building is a bit old (ie. rug). PROS: 1. Inside basketball court 2. Inside track and pools 3. Very high-quality Kaiser gym equipment (high pressure) -two floors of weights and good stuff CONS: 1. surrounding area of LA is typical big city.. not very walkable

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay !”
Reviews.Author: cecilskong
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed my stay at the L.A. Athletic Club . The room was more than adequate: terry robes, refrigerator, nice bathroom with shampoos, razor etc. The building itself is grand ! A beautiful indoor pool, a basketball court , cardio, weights and spa facilities...if you like to work out you can't do much better. Complimentary hot breakfast buffet, coffee and muffins brought to your room in the morning...a very professional staff, nice atmoshere. I found the area walkable, and mostly pleasant...a homeless person here and there but hey it's a city. The only negative I'll mention is that the mattress was a little on the firm side , but I would definitely stay there again .

Reviews.Title: “Quite a bargain! A real gem.”
Reviews.Author: CarolSP
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed here for three night on business. What a bargain! The pluses: It's conveniently close to the freeway, right in the jewelry district of LA, and very reasonably priced. Staff are fabulous: polite, helpful, and friendly. It's a beautiful old building, and the rooms, while small, are very nice. It's got an older, slightly funky charm. You can see signs of wear-and-tear on it, but I have to say the bed, while firmer than I like, was still reasonably comfortable, and everything was very clean. There are such nice little touches, too, like a basket of fruit and cheese delivered to your room before check-in, chocolate mints every day on your pillows, and you can order free morning coffee service delivered to your room. I've never before seen not just shampoo, conditioner, soaps and creams in the bathrooms, but also a fresh disposable razor, shaving cream, & a toothbrush and some toothpaste, as well. It also has a very good restaurant on site, which offers a free breakfast: no continental silliness here: this is a full breakfast, with eggs, potatoes, toast, bacon, sausage, fresh fruit, yogurt (the real stuff, not just yoplait, though they have that as well) etc. On Fridays they have a cook there doing omelettes to order. The restaurant offers dinner and lunch as well, and, by LA standards, is reasonably priced and pretty good quality. You are free to use the athletic facilities, too: an indoor pool, weights, sauna, steam room, etc.) It IS an athletic club, after all. Over all, I would definitely recommend this place to anyone, except possibly someone who was mobility impaired: while there are elevators, of course, I think there may be some areas (like the parking garage) which would be at least a hassle to get to for someone on crutches or a wheelchair, or just had trouble with stairs, if in fact it's possible to avoid the stairs from the lobby area to the elevators which go to the garage. Indoor parking is reasonably priced and seemed more than adequate for the size of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A sad spot”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference at this hotel, and was fore-warned not to book a room. I'm glad I did not. The area is loaded w/aggressive pan-hanlers and street-sleepers (my sympathies, but not a great vac experience). The desk had to call a cab each time, and warned me not to wait outside the door. The facilities were down at the heels and just sad.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay in LA”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stay at the LAAC once a month and I love it. I especially appreciate the workout facilities. The buffet breakfast is wonderful and the staff treat you well. The robes and fruit baskets in your room are a welcome addition. I highly recommend staying here to my coworkers and friends.

HotelInfo.Name: The Los Angeles Athletic Club
HotelInfo.Address: 431 W. Seventh Street, Los Angeles, CA 90014
